subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Marian Gaborik gaffe that cost the Rangers a victory in Game 4 against the Capitals on Wednesday night follows in a long line of notable miscues in the N.H.L. playoffs.
snippet: The Marian Gaborik gaffe that cost the Rangers a victory in Game 4 against the Capitals on Wednesday night follows in a long line of notable miscues in the N.H.L. playoffs.
